summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS STOP WORKING IN HEAVY RAIN, ALMOST LOST CONTROL OVER THIS MALFUNCTION, 94-97 CHEVROLET S-10'S HAVE THE WIPER MOTOR RECALL, WHY NOT THE 98'S??? I KNOW MORE PEOPLE WITH 98'S THAT ARE HAVING TROUBLE THEN THE PEOPLE WITH THE 94-97'S...IF A RECALL ISN'T ISSUED SOMEONE IS GOING TO GET HURT BECAUSE OF THESE WIPER MOTORS! JZ.     *NLM
